ifYouWouldLikeToSearch: If you would like to search for other organization or Coworkers to follow, please click on the appropriate button below to get started.
msgErrUnableToFollow: Sorry, unable to follow {0} at this time
msgErrUnableToUnFollow: Sorry, unable to unfollow {0} at this time
msgNotFollowingAnyone: This is where you will see a list of the people, organizations, programs, activities and groups that you are following.  Choose one of the options below to find an organization or coworker, then click Follow.  Visit the volunteer page to follow a volunteer activity, or the Give page to follow a giving program.  Create a group on your user profile page so that you and other group members can follow that group's activity.
